revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Split-Decision Ruins |image = [[File:Split-Decision Ruins.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Split-Decision Ruins. |tokens = 2,000,000 |location = South of Frigid Sea }}
<!--T:2--> '''Split-Decision Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 32,870,660 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Electabuzz.png|40px]] Electabuzz || rowspan=8 colspan=2| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Cryogonal.png|40px]] Cryogonal |- | [[File:Bronzong.png|40px]] Bronzong |- | [[File:Stonjourner.png|40px]] Stonjourner |- | [[File:Galvantula.png|40px]] Galvantula |- | [[File:Relicanth.png|40px]] Relicanth |- | [[File:Glalie.png|40px]] Glalie |- | [[File:Metagross.png|40px]] Metagross |}
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Altaria.png|50px]] Altaria || rowspan=2| <center>156,135,635 || rowspan=4 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Electivire.png|50px]] Electivire |- | [[File:Regidrago.png|50px]] Regidrago || rowspan=2| <center>164,353,300 |- | [[File:Regieleki.png|50px]] Regieleki |}
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 39.46% || 38.62% || 34.88% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 39.46% || 38.62% || 34.88% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|White Shard}} || N/A || 5.27% || 5.63% || 7.25% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 5.27% || 5.63% || 7.25% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 5.27% || 5.63% || 7.25% |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 5.27% || 5.63% || 7.25% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Draco Plate}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.12% || 0.62% |- | {{Bag2|Zap Plate}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.12% || 0.62% |}
